DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire 8 Products Used Regularly Since First Told You Had Cancer Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the products they have used regularly since they were first told they had cancer.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Products Used Regularly Since Cancer Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about the tobacco-containing products an individual has used regularly since they were first told they had cancer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Property.preferredName: Products Used Regularly Since Cancer Diagnosis
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about the tobacco-containing products an individual has used regularly since they were first told they had cancer.

Concepts.longName: Products Used Regularly Since Cancer Diagnosis
Concepts.definition: A question about the tobacco-containing products an individual has used regularly since they were first told they had cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Be specific about something; define clearly.: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

PermissibleValues.value: Paan with tobacco, gutka, zarda, khaini
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Gutka Zarda Khaini Or Paan with Tobacco

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Gutka Zarda Khaini Or Paan with Tobacco
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A combination of crushed areca nut, tobacco, catechu, paraffin wax, slaked lime, and sweet or savory flavorings. It is placed between the cheek and gum and is a mild stimulant.: A combination of tobacco, lime, spices, vegetable dyes, and areca nut. It is typically chewed for its stimulant effects.: A combination of tobacco and slaked lime paste with or without areca nut. It is placed between the cheek and gum and is a mild stimulant.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: A combination of betel leaf, areca nut, and tobacco. It is chewed for its stimulant and psychoactive effects.

Concepts.definition: A combination of crushed areca nut, tobacco, catechu, paraffin wax, slaked lime, and sweet or savory flavorings. It is placed between the cheek and gum and is a mild stimulant.
A combination of tobacco, lime, spices, vegetable dyes, and areca nut. It is typically chewed for its stimulant effects.
A combination of tobacco and slaked lime paste with or without areca nut. It is placed between the cheek and gum and is a mild stimulant.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A combination of betel leaf, areca nut, and tobacco. It is chewed for its stimulant and psychoactive effects.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A moist powder tobacco product that is used by placing it under the upper lip for extended periods.

Concepts.definition: A moist powder tobacco product that is used by placing it under the upper lip for extended periods.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An Indian cigarette consisting of tobacco wrapped in a tendu leaf.

Concepts.definition: An Indian cigarette consisting of tobacco wrapped in a tendu leaf.

PermissibleValues.value: Smokeless tobacco, like dip, chew, or snuff

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Tobacco that is not smoked but used in another form such as chewing tobacco or snuff.

Concepts.definition: Tobacco that is not smoked but used in another form such as chewing tobacco or snuff.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An Indonesian cigarette made of tobacco and cloves.

Concepts.definition: An Indonesian cigarette made of tobacco and cloves.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A tobacco pipe with a long flexible tube that cools the smoke by passing it through water.

Concepts.definition: A tobacco pipe with a long flexible tube that cools the smoke by passing it through water.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A tube with a small bowl at one end, especially one used for smoking tobacco.

Concepts.definition: A tube with a small bowl at one end, especially one used for smoking tobacco.

PermissibleValues.value: Traditional cigars, cigarillos or filtered cigars

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A compact roll of tobacco leaves prepared for smoking.: A small cigar similar in size to a cigarette. Unlike a cigarette, a cigarillo is wrapped in whole-leaf tobacco.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: A smaller cigar that is combined with a filter intended to reduce the amount of smoke, tar, and fine particles inhaled.

Concepts.definition: A compact roll of tobacco leaves prepared for smoking.
A small cigar similar in size to a cigarette. Unlike a cigarette, a cigarillo is wrapped in whole-leaf tobacco.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A smaller cigar that is combined with a filter intended to reduce the amount of smoke, tar, and fine particles inhaled.

PermissibleValues.value: E-cigarettes or other electronic nicotine delivery system

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette.

Concepts.definition: A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.(NCI)

Concepts.definition: Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Since you were first told you
ReferenceDocuments.description: Since you were first told you had cancer, which of the following products have you used regularly?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.
